CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1957, pg. B17 reads: "Golden Anniversary For The Andersons - Mr. and Mrs. Dan Anderson were honorees at a brilliant dinner, observing their 50th wedding anniversary, at which their nieces and nephews were hosts. Held at Warren Methodist Church, the hosts included Robert Speight, Mrs. Margaret Wilson, Mrs. Jackie Taylor, Mrs. Mary Jane Harriston and Miss Phyllis Wilson.  Guests included, left to right, seated: Miss Julia Derby, Clara Evans, Haymond Harvey, Judy Wilson, Jeannette Goodnight, Robert Speights, Mrs. Bertie Moore, Harry Williams, Mrs. Mary Williams, Eva Pennex, Anna Green, Arnold Carver.  Standing: Mrs. Frank Taylor Sr., Donna Pryor, Mr. and Mrs. Si Willis, Georgie McVea, Mr. and Mrs. Frank Taylor Jr., with the honorees in center.  The Rev. Ramsey Bridges is Warren's pastor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of anniversary party guests, from left, seated: Julia Derby, Clara Evans, Haymond Harvey, Judy Wilson, Jeannette Goodnight, Robert Speights, Bertie Moore, Harry Williams, Mary Williams, Eva Pennex, Anna Green, and Arnold Carver; standing: Mrs. Frank Taylor Sr., Donna Pryor, Mr. and Mrs. Si Willis, Georgie McVea, Mr. and Mrs. Frank Taylor Jr., and honorees Mr. and Mrs. Dan Anderson in center, posed in Warren Methodist Church
